snippet.title: "The Last Defense" GamePlay TRAILER!
snippet.description:
The Last Defense is a Fantasy, Tower Defense under the category of Story-rich games. Unique cut-scenes and storyline separates TLD from other Tower Defense games.
Wishlist the game on Steam, it helps me a lot. 

Here are some links for you:

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1726290/The_Last_Defense/

Website:
https://thuggames.webnode.com

TikTok: 
https://www.tiktok.com/@steliyan.dev

Discord:
https://discord.gg/WvpvREes3u

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/ThugGames3

FaceBook:
https://www.facebook.com/TheLastDefense

Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/thuggames_official

#gamedev #TheLastDefense #TowerDefense #indiegame
